sec.p: From the analysis on the effect of habitat characteristics on occurrence of different feeding guilds, it was found that the proportion of omnivorous species increased with increasing heterogeneity and was independent of any other habitat characteristics. In contrast, the proportions of frugivorous ( Fig 5) and insectivorous birds ( Fig 6) decreased with increasing altitude and was independent of any other habitat characteristics ( Table 1).

div.div: The relationship between the proportion of frugivorous bird species and altitude.
The relationship between the proportion of insectivorous bird species and altitude.
